title: Season 12 Sneak Preview
description:
When Kenzie first met Joe – she thought he was funny, successful and charming. Despite many strange circumstances in Joe’s personal life, it was the best relationship Kenzie had ever had…But when her loved ones began to suspect Joe wasn’t at all who he said he was, they came together to uncover his secrets and save their friend – just in the nick of time. 

Be on the lookout for the first episode of the six-part series, Thursday March 31st 2022. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
